channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Can the University of Austin Be Replicated?
item.description: Its slimmed-down finances could prove as significant as its curriculum.

item.description: Two cases pending before SCOTUS give the justices the opportunity to stave off Virginia Democrats' seemingly unconstitutional gun control proposals.

item.title: Illegal Aliens Kill Scores Of Americans For Every Leftist Who Dies Protecting Them
item.description: Leftist radicals don't care about the innocent Americans whose lives were ripped away by criminal illegal aliens.

item.description: House Democratic leaders told President Trump Tuesday that if he won't fire Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem, they will move to impeach her.

item.title: UnitedHealth is reeling from a nearly 20% stock rout after warning investors about its first revenue decline in decades
item.description: "The company expects to return to growth in 2026," UnitedHealth said in May of last year. Today it revealed that it will take a bit longer.

item.description: There’s a growing gap between AI's potential and how companies actually use it.

item.title: 5 questions about the St. Paul church disruption
item.description: Approximately 40 agitators invaded Cities Church during a service, verbally terrorizing parishioners and blocking exits, causing families to flee.

item.title: The Second Amendment Role Reversal
item.description: The truth is, legally, Alex Pretti was within his rights to have his gun on his person; but that doesn’t mean his actions were prudent.

item.title: Like January 6, Minnesota Is a Test of American National Sovereignty
item.description: ICE tactics are the pretext; the real issue is whether states can make themselves no-go zones immune from federal law.

item.title: Trump Should Talk To Angel Parents Before He Takes ICE Out Of Minneapolis
item.description: The father of a woman killed by a drunk illegal alien says appeasing sanctuary mayors and violent radicals will make more victims.

item.title: Before California, France tried a wealth tax. Macron repealed it after rich people fled the country instead of paying
item.description: A 20-year French experiment with a wealth tax ended with mixed results, but its removal created problems of its own.
